capabilityDescription.en: Fetches parameters from AWS SecretsManager.  Each secret becomes a Parameter group, which can map to a Parameter Context, with key/value pairs in the secret mapping to Parameters in the group.
capabilityDescription.zh: Fetches parameters from AWS SecretsManager.  Each secret becomes a Parameter group, which can map to a Parameter Context, with key/value pairs in the secret mapping to Parameters in the group.

en.description: Specifies an optional SSL Context Service that, if provided, will be used to create connections

zh.description: 指定可选的SSL上下文服务（如果提供），将用于创建连接

en.description: Service used to obtain an Amazon Web Services Credentials Provider

zh.description: Service used to obtain an Amazon Web Services Credentials Provider

en.description: A Regular Expression matching on Secret Name that identifies Secrets whose parameters should be fetched. Any secrets whose names do not match this pattern will not be fetched.

zh.description: A Regular Expression matching on Secret Name that identifies Secrets whose parameters should be fetched. Any secrets whose names do not match this pattern will not be fetched.
